Hi everyone!

I have small problem with wsus package publisher. When i want create any package then I have error like this

Where is a problem? Cert is still valid - I check this. Elso I have enough space on WSUS drive

Thank u for your reply!
Mateusz

Hi, once you have this message, go to 'Help' -> 'Send Debug Info' and click on the link 'Show Informations'.
Send me the file at package.publisher@free.fr
Hi, I send u email with logs 2 days ego. Can u check it?

I have received your debug file.
Error was : 11/4/2014 10:22:38 AM **** System.ComponentModel.Win32Exception : CreateDirectory failed

Can you check share and NTFS permissions on folders :

E:\WSUS\UpdateServicesPackages
E:\WSUS\WsusContent
